translations: 扎，戳；使（身体某部位）刺痛；使……感到内疚（或尴尬）；驱使，驱策；（动物）竖起（耳朵）
扎，穿刺；针刺感，刺痛（感）；蠢材，笨蛋，讨厌的家伙；一阵不快；阴茎；<古>赶牛棒

sentences.sentence: Prick holes in the paper with a pin.
The roses are thorny. Take care not to prick your hands.
sentences.translation: 玫瑰有刺， 小心扎手。

sentences.sentence: You will feel a tiny prick in your arm.
sentences.translation: 你会觉得胳膊上有一点点刺痛。
